subject: Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
We the United Nations Fund Investigation Unit Seattle Unit wish to
inform your overdue fund which originated from United Kingdom
and Africa Countries such as Contract/Inheritance/Lotto Winning Fund
US$1.5M has been registered with U.S Dept of the Treasury
International Monetary Fund (IMF) to release your fund immediately
without any further delay.
Your outstanding payment will be release to you immediately you
provide your details listed below:
1) Your full Name:
2) Your Full Address:
3) Phones, Fax and Mobile No:
4) Profession, Age and Marital Status:
5) Copy of any valid form of your Identification:
Meanwhile all legal documents will be release to you before your fund
will be Paid off  with other obligatory process.
Please reply to this Email:jw000206@outlook.com   with this Refrence
:U.N.O/W.B.O/CODE-6968/2023
Jeffrey Waterfall
Department Of Treasury
United Nations Fund Investigation
Unit Seattle Washington.

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Jeffrey Waterfall,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my overdue fund. I appreciate the information you have provided. However, before proceeding further, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is in order.

1. Can you please provide more details about the origin of this fund? How exactly did it originate from the United Kingdom and Africa countries?

2. What is the total amount of the fund that is being released to me?

3. Could you explain the process through which the Department of Treasury and Monetary Fund IMF will release my payment? Are there any fees or charges involved?

4. Can you clarify what legal documents will be released to me and why they are necessary for the payment process?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with receiving my overdue fund.

Best wishes,
Cheryl

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Cheryl

It’s a process that has to do with u paid beneficiaries and your name was listed among . The total amount is about $1.5 million Dollars . And this will be processed in 14 working days  once your have sent us your details .

Get back to me
Regards

Jeffrey Waterfall

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Jeffrey,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm interested in learning more about this process you mentioned. Can you please provide me with some additional details? What exactly is this payment for? And how did my name get listed for it?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cheryl

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
It’s an overdue

fund which originated from

United States of America such as

Contract/Inheritance/Lotto Winning Fund

Payment, which has been on hold for many years now, so your name was randomly chosen .  Kindly provide your details such


(1). Full Name: (2). Contact Address: (3). Telephone Number: (4).

Occupation: (5). Age: (6). Sex: (7). Marital Status: (7). Working

Identity Card/


The official payment is $1.5 Million Dollars. And the process will take about 21 days to get it accomplished.


Get back to me
Regards


Jeffrey Waterfall

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Jeffrey Waterfall,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you sharing this information with me. Could you please provide me with more details about the overdue fund? How exactly was my name randomly chosen for this opportunity?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the process involved in receiving the payment. Are there any fees or charges that need to be paid upfront? And what is the official method of payment?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Cheryl

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
The  overdue fund are originated by The United Nations finds investigation unit here in Washington. And on the process this will only cost some amount of taxes to enable us complete the process . Kindly send us your details as requested .
Regards

Jeffrey waterfall

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Jeffrey, thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the overdue fund from The United Nations funds unit. Could you please provide me with more details on how the process works and what taxes are involved?

Best wishes,
Cheryl

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Cheryl

This process will be arries our once to you send your details . Of which wii process the legal document that will back up the funds and it will take about two week to accomplish it . It’s either you are paid by bank draft or by wire transfer from our paying banks . Get back to me with your

Full Name

Address

Age

Occupation

Phone number .
Regards

Jeffrey Waterfall

subject: Re:   Attn: Funds Beneficiary,
body:
Hello Jeffrey,

Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you provided about the process. Could you please clarify what the funds are for and how this legal document will be used? Additionally, can you explain more about the paying banks and how they operate?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Cheryl
